snippet: An appeals court is likely to overturn a rejection of the Securities and Exchange Commission’s fraud settlement with Citigroup over the sale of mortgage-related investments.
abstract: An appeals court is likely to overturn a rejection of the Securities and Exchange Commission’s fraud settlement with Citigroup over the sale of mortgage-related investments.

headline.main: Ruling Gives Edge to U.S. in Its Appeal of Citi Case
headline.print_headline: Ruling Gives Edge to U.S. In Its Appeal Of Citi Case
